// src/pages/TermsAndConditions.jsx import React from 'react'; const TermsAndConditions = () => { return (

Terms & Conditions

Please read the following terms and conditions carefully before using our services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these terms.

1. Booking and Payment

All bookings are subject to availability and must be confirmed via payment. Payments are processed through secure methods, and your booking will not be confirmed until payment is received.

2. Cancellations and Refunds

Cancellation policies vary depending on the service. Refunds will be issued according to the specific policy applied to your booking. Please refer to the FAQ section for more detailed guidance.

3. Baggage Policy

Baggage allowances are listed in our Baggage Policy section. Additional fees may apply for overweight or extra bags.

4. User Responsibilities

You are responsible for providing accurate personal information during booking and for checking in before your flight. Any violations may result in cancellation or denial of service.

5. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to update these terms and conditions at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

6. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns regarding these terms, feel free to reach out via our Help Center.

); }; export default TermsAndConditions;
